Text: im downloading it but will it work with skidrow version ?
Yay, all my save games are gone now. Umm, so I have to start the game over now. I'm trying my best not to rage.

Your saves aren't gone if you switch crack, they're just a folder that is different than the one this crack uses.
All you need to do is to Google Dishonored save location or something like it, and copy all your saves to the newer folder, which is used with this crack.
This'll save you frustration not just in this game, but in just about any other.

This is a mess...
proper of the proper...
fixes for the proper...

Do I need this fix if I have the reloaded real proper release?

If you are applying this to the 3DM version you need to copy your saves.
Old saves:  C:Usersyour usernameAppDataLocalSKIDROW205100Storage

New location: C:ProgramDataRELOADEDRLD!205100storage

Hopefully this works for you and every will be shiny.

Damn TPB and not allowing slashes...

Old: C: -> Users  -> your username -> AppData -> Local -> SKIDROW -> 205100 -> Storage
New: C: -> ProgramData -> RELOADED -> RLD! ->  -> 205100 -> storage
they should warn you that you need to back up your saves, once you apply new fix or crack you will loose them

working good.

the fact that every crack changes save location doesn't have anything to do with knowing how pirated games works. pretty much every other game makes it's own save folder and you're free to use any crack from any cracker team without changing that folder.

Yeah I also think its stupid that reloaded, skidrow, flt uses their own "save spots", as the default save place for dishonored is my documets/my games/dishonored. Why cant they just leave them at the default area, because they have some delusion of grandeur and just have to have their name everywhere and play cracker god and show that they decide where the save files should go. Just silly, just save the savefiles where they should be saved you fucking morons!

I think the real danger of having a "Reloaded" or "Skidrow" save location is that they make it a trivial thing for any legitimate patch to find and delete them.

They should put saves where they would be if you bought the retail version so there is no easy way to retaliate against piracy.

fer frig sakes.i did EXACTLY as the instructions said it and it deleted my games game files.great now i gotta start allover again

thehippie1969
Your save files are not gone. It's just that your previous crack used a diferent folder to save files.

Skidrow uses the folder  - (your win 7 user folder)AppDataLocalSKIDROW

Reloded uses - C:ProgramDataRELOADEDRLD!

Just copy the files to the new location, and your done!
If you had a diferent crack, find out what is the save folder that it uses and copy em to the Reloaded folder.

Hope it helped!
Oh my god lol I was panicking so bad when I thought my saves got deleted. Thanks to everyone posting the fix xD
